Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: "C" (2.0), or better required in all of the following EGN 3310, EGN 3321 and EGM 3601.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Knowledge of engineering approaches and tools that are used in the different aspects of biomechanics.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Engineering and Computer Science

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Grade of "C" (2.0) or Better in EGN 3310 and EGN 3321.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Overview of Rehabilitation Engineering with emphasis on engineering principles and science involved in developing devices and technological solutions to assist individuals with disabilities and impairments.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Engineering and Computer Science

Department.title: Department
